plot: During World War II members of a clan, police collaborating with the Japanese and shady Shanghai businessmen all want to control possession of an ancient Buddha statuette.
title: Fo guang xia ying
plot_es: During World War II members of a clan, police collaborating with the Japanese and shady Shanghai businessmen all want to control possession of an ancient Buddha statuette.
plot_en: During World War II members of a clan, police collaborating with the Japanese and shady Shanghai businessmen all want to control possession of an ancient Buddha statuette.
